post_info.post_title: Boston Red Sox are the best!

Your going to jinx us! I've been a Red Sox fan since 1988 so basically my whole life. I've yet to give up on the Red Sox and hope that this year will finally be the one that they win it all. However I've learned not to get my hopes up too early in the season. Especially not when they are in the same division as the Yankees who still have time to dish out more money and get more MVPs on their roster.

emoticon_xgood emoticon_xgood Yep I hope they can pull it off this year. But I am not going to hold my breath though. they start out great but for the most part they peter out 1/2 way though. Good Luck Red Sox we are rooting for you. emoticon_xgood emoticon_xagree emoticon_xagree
They just took 3 out of 4 with the Yankees.Thats a good sign..lol emoticon_xgood
